storyInfo: Hibiscus tries to convince Czerny to cancel the duet, but to no avail. Having second thoughts, Ebenholz runs into a suspicious person who seems to have a hand in the rumors circulating around the Afterglow.

attributes.content: How do you feel? All better now, right?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I'm fine...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm totally fine, I'm sure of it. The both of us are.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm going out for a bit, so stay put here.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You're going out again the moment you feel a little better?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I've got work to do.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's fine and all, but shouldn't you at least wait until you've recovered?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Don't worry about me.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Hibiscus said the same thing. After you wake up, it'd be best to keep resting for a while and monitoring your condition.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: It's an emergency, one that can't wait. Alright?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But, there's not a whole lot of time left until the concert. I think the most important to do until then is to make sure you're healthy and well-practiced... I'm sure that's what you want too.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Can you stop pestering me with that right now?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Pestering?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But I have to go, so don't get in my way. I'll be back as soon as I can.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: And you really... can't tell me what you're going to do?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: If everything goes well... you'll know soon enough.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Oh right, your suit.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What about it?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I made an appointment to pick it up this afternoon, but I won't be able to go with you. You should go get it yourself.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Remember to bring your cello with you and play a little passage as you're trying it on. Make sure there aren't any areas that feel uncomfortable.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll be back.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You again?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Yes, it's me.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm here to ask you to put this concert on hold. Or at least, don't let Ebenholz and Kreide play together.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Something terrible is going to happen in the Afterglow if those two play together!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: So if what you're saying is true, my recent improvement was due to this so-called 'false recovery' caused by Ebenholz and Kreide. And as soon as this phase is over, I'll become critically ill and my life will be in danger.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That's right. You've been around them a lot, so the symptoms will also be a lot more pronounced.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Others who've had less contact with them are also affected, and if I let the two of them play together, there's a high possibility that people will die?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Correct. Even though I don't know the exact reason, having the two play together seems to amplify the effect they have on their surroundings.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How likely are we talking about here?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I can't say for sure right now...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Other than me, who else is in life-threatening danger?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Over a dozen people from the Afterglow have already been hospitalized in the Cliffy Patio.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The Cliffy Patio... In other words, they've already left Ebenholz and Kreide's effective range?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That should be the case.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Then I have a clear picture of the situation.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Your answer...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ...is no.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm not asking you to cancel the whole concert. You can just cut Ebenholz and Kreide's part, or even have someone else perform the duet!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If you can prove that their duet will cause harm to people other than me, then I'll cancel the concert right away.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But it seems that's not the case. Even you have no idea what would happen if they played together. I can't simply throw away the efforts and aspirations of everyone in the Afterglow over these illusory 'concerns.'
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The efforts and aspirations...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I understand how much this concert means to you, but...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You don't understand anything.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: If you truly understood, you wouldn't throw around the word 'but' so lightly.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I cannot change the concert schedule on your word alone.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny, please give me a straight answer. What makes this concert more important than the lives of the Infected?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Are you suggesting that I'm disregarding peoples' lives?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'm just saying––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus! Hibiscus!
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Ms. Ursula?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come take a little stroll, won't you?
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come now.
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: Let's head out and calm down first. We can talk about this later, okay?
attributes.name: Ursula

attributes.content: (If everything Gertrude said is true, then Kreide won't survive this.)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (No, there must be some way... Some way to come out ahead on both fronts...)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Czerny, Czerny must know something...)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (No, he's just a musician, he won't be able to help.)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Should I tell Kreide the truth––)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (But what good would that do?)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Rhodes Island...)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Someone like Hibiscus is only going to send me back to my cell in Urtica!)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (The Empresses' Voice?)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (What am I even thinking? Is this a suicide mission?!)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (No, I've been going in circles. I'm standing out too much. I need to go somewhere less crowded.)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Huh? Have I seen that man before?)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Be careful.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Definitely... the crowd.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: (Right, the rumor. There was that rumor!)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (I've got to get to the bottom of this rumor. Who knows, there might even be some clues, or the person spreading the rumor might know something!)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (But it's all up to me at this point...)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: This is the best opportunity we're going to get.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: The longer things drag on, the less time we'll have. It'll only make things harder.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Alright, hurry it up then. I'll go report to the higher-ups. I'm counting on you, Herr Lachmann.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Heh. This work sure is demanding, physically and emotionally.
attributes.name: Lachmann

attributes.content: It's hard enough spreading the rumors. Now I even have to go THERE...
attributes.name: Lachmann

attributes.content: (The sewers? He's heading into the sewers?)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (I'd rather not have to follow him down there... Time to act.)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Hold it right there.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Lachmann

attributes.content: Don't turn around.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Tell me, who sent you to spread rumors in the Afterglow?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You've got the wrong idea, I just happened to overhear...
attributes.name: Lachmann

attributes.content: I've been following you the whole time, Herr Lachmann.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: And I connected the dots just now. You were one fanning the flames before, spreading rumors to have that mob accost Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You've got a pretty good memory.
attributes.name: Lachmann

attributes.content: Speak. Who sent you here, and what were you planning to do in the sewers?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What wonderful timing. I am also quite curious as to what Herr Lachmann planned to do in the sewers.
Don't turn around, or else...
What do you think will happen?
